title: Settings
name: Setting
warning: Warning! Removing a currency from available currencies may cause all the records that's using that currency to be deleted. Please download your data backup before changing any settings to prevent data-loss.
warningInitialSetup: Warning! Default Currency can't be changed after the initial setup. This is usually your country's local currency. Please make sure you've chosen correctly before saving.
